content.title: THE CURRENT THEME
content.text: The currently selected theme is always shown on top under the "Current Admin Theme" section.

content.title: AVAILABLE THEMES
content.text: Each theme / template registered within the system for the administration section is shown on this page under the "Available Admin Themes" section.

content.title: CHANGING THE THEME
content.text: To apply a different template for the administration section of this site, simply click on the thumbnail of the desired item and you're set to go.

content.title: REMOVING A THEME
content.text: To remove a theme from this page, simply click the delete button under the selected item. This will not actually delete the related files, it only removes the reference from the database.
